chandrika kumarathunga mahathmiyata shri lanka nidahas pakshaya thula thani thirana gannata nohaki bawa sama kabinat prakashaka krida amathya dayasiri jayasekara mahatha pawasayi.amathiwaraya ese kiwe idiri palath palana mathiwaranayata shrilanipayath, eekabaddha wipakshaye shrilanipa kandayamath ekwa tharaga kirima sambandhayen ema deparshwaya athara heta (03da) pawathwimata niyamitha sakachcha nopawathwana lesa hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiya dadi lesa wirodhaya pala karana bawata labena aaranchiya gana madhyawediyaku asu prashnayata pilithuru demini.

roginge sthri/purusha bhawaya pilibanda sadacharathmaka ho sanskruthika gataluwak me sayanika puhunuwa sambandhayen wadagath wanne nam eya waidya ha heda sewawan dekata ma eka se balapawath wiya yuthu bawa da rajaye heda niladharinge sangamaya pawasayi.jathyanthara heda upadhi patamalawantada prasawa ha nariwedaya pilibandawa sayanika puhunuwim anthargatha nowana bawatath, kurunagala shikshana rohale suthikagarawalata pirimi heda sisun balahathkarayen ma athulu wu bawatath mulumanin ma asathya prachara rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya janathawa atharata genayanne yayi da ema sangamaya chodana karayi.heda sewawe ayithin ha waraprasada kappadu kirime uthsahayaka waidya sangamaya digin digata ma nirathawa sitina bawath, 2009 wasare di heda upadhi patamalawe puhunu kalaya sambandhayen balapam kara eya wasara hathare sita thuna dakwa adu kala bawath ema sangamaya mehi di sihipath kara sitiyi.melesa heda sewawe pawathmata erehiwa digin digata ma balapam karamin sitina waidya sangamaya dan uthsaha karanne sawadya matha samajagatha karamin, jathyanthara mattame heda sewawak shri lankawa thula bihiwima kese ho walakwimata bawa pawasana ema sangamaya eyin siduwanne me rate janathawata wada honda saukhya sewawak labaganimata athi awasthawa ahimi wima bawa awadharanaya karayi..
